item.title: Create a Blog With Hugo and Github
item.description: Prerequisites on Github Create a public respository blog_code for storing the code. Create an another public repository mygithubname.github.io to deploy (publish) the site. This one must have the same name as the Github username. Open a shell on your dev environment Clone the blog_code respository. 1 git clone git@github.com:isibox/blog_code.git Go to the blog_code folder. 1 cd blog_code Create a new site with Hugo 1 hugo new site cloud-guru-blog Install a theme for Hugo Go to new site folder, and then in the themes folder.
